name: Recruitment
description: This cog helps in recruitment for clash royale families by handling requirement check, approvals, recruit codes and assigning roles after being accepted.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores clash-royale data such as in-game username, id and other stats.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the repository! Join our server for support: https://discord.gg/ZFW7g58
